headline: 3 Reasons CHTR is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Charter’s 17.9% return over the past six months has outpaced the S&P 500 by 12.8%, and its stock price has climbed to $383.08 per share. This was partly thanks to its solid quarterly results, and the performance may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
